{"id":897772379,"question_id":65,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1676369245,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/897772379/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Number","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isNumber(String s) {\n        if(s.length()==0)\n            return false;        \n        \n        if(s.charAt(0)=='-' || s.charAt(0)=='+'){\n            \n            if(s.length()<2)\n                return false;\n            \n            if(s.charAt(1)=='-' || s.charAt(1)=='+')\n                return false;\n            \n            return isNumber(s.substring(1, s.length()));\n        }\n            \n        \n        char prev = '+';\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            \n            if(Character.isDigit(ch))\n                continue;\n            \n            if((ch=='+' || ch=='-') && prev!='e' && prev!='E')\n                return false;\n            \n            if(ch=='.' && i==s.length()-1)\n                return false;\n            \n            \n            if((ch=='E' || ch=='e') && i<s.length()-1 && Character.isDigit(prev))\n                continue;\n            \n            if(ch-'a'<=0 || ch-'a'>25)\n                return false;\n            \n            prev=ch;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
